languages.text:
Fires 4 {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}short-burning{/g} torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>
languages.original_text:
Выпускает 4 залпа торпед ускоренного цикла с плазменными боеголовками. Каждая торпеда наносит 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} при {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}прямом попадании{/g} и 13 урона в радиусе 1 клетки при промахе и детонации от неконтактного взрывателя.
У торпед ускоренного цикла выше {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорость{/g}, лучше {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}маневренность{/g} и больше возможностей для уклонения, но короче период эксплуатации.
<indent=5%>Перезарядка: 1 раунд</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Fires 4 Short-burning Torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 Damage by a Direct Hit and 13 Damage within a 1-cell area when misses and is detonated by a proximity fuse.
Short-burning Torpedoes have greater Speed, Evasion and Manoeuvrability, but shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

Выпускает 4 залпа торпед ускоренного цикла с плазменными боеголовками. Каждая торпеда наносит 19 урона при прямом попадании и 13 урона в радиусе 1 клетки при промахе и детонации от неконтактного взрывателя.
У торпед ускоренного цикла выше скорость, лучше маневренность и больше возможностей для уклонения, но короче период эксплуатации.
<indent=5%>Перезарядка: 1 раунд</indent>

Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.

traits.locale_text:
Выпускает 4 залпа торпед ускоренного цикла с плазменными боеголовками. Каждая торпеда наносит 19 урона при прямом попадании и 13 урона в радиусе 1 клетки при промахе и детонации от неконтактного взрывателя.
У торпед ускоренного цикла выше скорость, лучше маневренность и больше возможностей для уклонения, но короче период эксплуатации.
<indent=5%>Перезарядка: 1 раунд</indent>

Выпускает 4 залпа торпед ускоренного цикла с плазменными боеголовками. Каждая торпеда наносит 19 урона при прямом попадании и 13 урона в радиусе 1 клетки при промахе и детонации от неконтактного взрывателя.
У торпед ускоренного цикла выше скорость, лучше маневренность и больше возможностей для уклонения, но короче период эксплуатации.
<indent=5%>Перезарядка: 1 раунд</indent>

languages.text:
Feuert 4 Torpedosalven von Plasma-Gefechtsköpfen mit {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}kurzer Brenndauer{/g} ab. Jeder Torpedo verursacht mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direkten Treffer{/g} 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Fehlschüsse verursachen in einem Radius von 1 Feld 13 Schaden, da sie mittels {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}Annäherungszünder{/g} explodieren.
Torpedos mit kurzer Brenndauer haben eine höhere {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g}, einen höheren {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g}-Wert und eine bessere {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierfähigkeit{/g}, aber eine geringere Lebensdauer.
<indent=5%>Nachladen: 1 Runde</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 4 {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}short-burning{/g} torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Feuert{/g} 4 Torpedosalven mit kurzer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Brennzeit{/g} mit Plasmasprengköpfen ab. Jeder Torpedo verursacht 19 Schaden bei einem direkten {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} und 13 Schaden in einem 1-Feld-Bereich beim Verfehlen und detoniert mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}Annäherungszünder{/g}.
Torpedos mit kurzer {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}Brennzeit{/g} haben eine höhere {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g}, höheres {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} und eine höhere {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g}, aber eine kürzere Lebensdauer.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Nachladen{/g}: 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Feuert{/g} 4 Torpedosalven von Plasma-Gefechtsköpfen mit {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}kurzer Brenndauer{/g} ab. Jeder Torpedo verursacht mit einem direkten Treffer 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Fehlschüsse verursachen in einem Radius von 1 Feld 13 Schaden, da sie mittels {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}Annäherungszünder{/g} explodieren.
Torpedos mit kurzer Brenndauer haben eine höhere {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g}, einen höheren {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g}-Wert und eine bessere {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierfähigkeit{/g}, aber eine geringere Lebensdauer.
<indent=5%>Nachladen: 1 Runde</indent>

languages.text:
Tire 4 salves de torpilles à {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}combustion rapide{/g} équipées d'ogives à plasma. Chaque torpille inflige 19 points de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en cas d'{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}impact direct{/g} et 13 points de dégâts dans une zone d'une case en cas de tir manqué et d'explosion déclenchée par une {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}fusée de proximité{/g}.
Les torpilles à combustion rapide sont plus performantes en termes de {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évitement{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g}, mais leur durée de vie est plus courte.
<indent=5%>Rechargement : 1 round</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 4 {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}short-burning{/g} torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Tire{/g} 4 salves de torpilles à {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}combustion{/g} rapide avec des ogives à plasma. Chaque torpille inflige 19 points de dégâts en cas de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} direct et 13 points de dégâts dans une zone d'une case en cas de tir manqué, explosant sur une {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}fusée de proximité{/g}.
Les torpilles à {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}combustion rapide{/g} sont plus performantes en termes de {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g}, leur durée de vie est plus courte.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Rechargement{/g} : 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}</indent>

languages.text:
发射4枚配备等离子弹头的{g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}短引信{/g}鱼雷。每枚鱼雷{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}直接命中{/g} 目标时会造成19点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。如果未能命中目标，则会引爆{g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}近炸引信{/g}，在1格范围内造成13点伤害。
短引信鱼雷拥有更高的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}，但时效较短。
<indent=5%>装填时间：一轮</indent>

Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.

{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}发射{/g}4枚配备等离子弹头的短引信鱼雷。{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}{/g}每枚鱼雷直接{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时会造成19点伤害。如果未能命中目标，则会引爆{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近炸引信{/g}，在1格范围内造成13点伤害。
{g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}短引信{/g}鱼雷拥有更高的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}，但时效较短。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}装填{/g}时间：一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}</indent>

发射4枚配备等离子弹头的短引信鱼雷。每枚鱼雷直接命中目标时会造成19点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。如果未能命中目标，则会引爆{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近炸引信{/g}，在1格范围内造成13点伤害。
短引信鱼雷拥有更高的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}，但时效较短。
<indent=5%>装填时间：一轮</indent>

languages.text:
Dispara salvas de 4 torpedos de {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}carga corta{/g} con ojivas de plasma. Cada torpedo inflige 19 de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} si consigue un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}impacto directo{/g} y 13 de daño en un radio de 1 casilla si falla, usando un {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}detonador de proximidad{/g}.
Los torpedos de carga corta tienen mejor {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasión{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g}, pero su duración es más baja.
<indent=5%>Recarga: 1 asalto</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 4 {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}short-burning{/g} torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Dispara salvas de 4 torpedos de carga corta con ojivas de plasma.{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}{/g} Cada torpedo inflige 19 de daño si consigue un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} directo y 13 de daño en un radio de 1 casilla si falla, usando un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}detonador de proximidad{/g}.
Los torpedos de {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}carga corta{/g} tienen mejor {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasión{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g}, pero su duración es más baja.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Recarga{/g}: 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}</indent>

languages.text:
プラズマ弾頭を搭載した短燃焼魚雷を4発発射する。魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近接信管{/g}で爆発し、直撃時に19{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、ミスした場合は1セル以内に13ダメージを与える。
短燃焼魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}が高いが、持続時間が短い。
<indent=5%>リロード：1ラウンド</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 4 short-burning torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

traits.locale_text:
プラズマ弾頭を搭載した短{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}魚雷を4発{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}発射{/g}する。魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近接信管{/g}で爆発し、{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}直撃{/g}時に19ダメージ、ミスした場合は1セル以内に13ダメージを与える。
{g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}短燃焼{/g}魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}が高いが、持続時間が短い。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}：1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}</indent>

プラズマ弾頭を搭載した短燃焼魚雷を4発発射する。魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近接信管{/g}で爆発し、直撃時に19{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、ミスした場合は1セル以内に13ダメージを与える。
短燃焼魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}が高いが、持続時間が短い。
<indent=5%>リロード：1ラウンド</indent>

languages.text:
Plazma savaş başlıklarıyla donatılmış 4 {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}hızlı yanan{/g} torpido salvosu ateşler. Her bir torpido, {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}doğrudan vuruşta{/g} 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasar{/g}; ıskalayıp da {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}yakınlık fünyesi{/g} ile patlatıldığı takdirde ise 1 hücrelik alanda 13 hasar verir.
Hızlı yanan torpidolar daha yüksek {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}hız{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}sıyrılma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manevra kabiliyetine{/g} sahip olsalar da daha kısa ömürlüdürler.
<indent=5%>Doldurma: 1 raunt</indent>
languages.original_text:
Fires 4 {g|Encyclopedia:ShortBurningSpace}short-burning{/g} torpedo salvos with plasma warheads. Each torpedo deals 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 13 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Short-burning torpedoes have greater {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} but a shorter lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>
